pages.text: $(li)Some $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) called you crazy when you said you were going to an island in the sky, but you are finally here!$(br)$(li)Now you only have to stay under this island to begin to float, and finally reach it.$(br)$(li)Once inside, do not try to destroy or place blocks, you will notice that a powerful magic will prevent you.
$(li)To get to the top, you will have to defeat enemies and solve puzzles inside, good luck, little adventure!
